title: Chlorophyte Drill
summaries: The Chlorophyte Drill is a Hardmode drill crafted using Chlorophyte Bars. It only has equivalent power to the Drax or Pickaxe Axe, but has +1 reach. It is an alternative to the Chlorophyte Pickaxe. Appearances and sounds aside, the two tools are nearly functionally identical. The drill, however is half a second faster. But, unlike pickaxes, most drills cannot be reforged with size, speed, or knockback modifiers. The Chlorophyte Drill can mine any block except Lihzahrd Bricks.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
